name: The Three Privateers
description:
Two players must coordinate to return their vessel safely to port. One must navigate the ship through treacherous waters while the other must manage the ship's crew. Can you you wrest control of the seas?

Reach the port at the North of the map!

CONTROLS

PLAYER 1 - NAVIGATOR

  • Left Analog Stick, up down - Move Forwards/Backwards
  • Right Analog Stick, left right - Turn Right/Left

PLAYER 2

  • Right Button, Left Button - Cycle through Crew Members
  • Left Analog Stick - Select Destination
    • UP - Bow
    • DOWN - Stern
    • LEFT - Left Cannons
    • RIGHT - Right Cannons
    • NO INPUT - Deck
  • A Button - Confirm Destination
  • Right Trigger - Fire Right Cannons
  • Left Trigger - Fire Left Cannons

RULES

WIN - Reach the Port at the North of the Map

LOSE -Get damaged when all 5 parts of the ship are already damaged. Aka Sink

PLAYER 1

  • Your goal is to navigate the ship to the top of the map.
  • If you run into rocks, you take damage.
  • If you get hit by an enemy bullet, you take damage.

PLAYER 2

  • Your goal is to keep the ship alive by directing the crew member to repair the ship and reload cannons.
  • Crew members will automatically repair parts of the ship they are on.
  • Crew members will reload cannons when stationed to them.
  • More crew members at one place speeds up repair/reloading.
